name: The Holidays of America and Britain Quiz for School
name_original: The Holidays of America and Britain Quiz for School
description: This is my first powerpoint project. In this analogue of famous "Jeopardy!" you need to guees some holidays and traditions of America and Great Kingdom. You may use this material as educational play-form quiz or holiday cooprarative game for all family. There in game you need to learn traditions of Anglo-Sax  Britian and American World. There are sometimes even strange and funny holidays, which you have to unravel. In next time i'll make good educational game, even with VBA scripts! Have fun on the holidays!
